---
name: Bug report (INVEST)
about: Bug expressed as a small, testable unit of work following INVEST principles
title: "[Bug]: "
labels: ["bug"]
assignees: []
---

## Independent  
Is this defect isolated to one area?

---

## Negotiable  
Is anything unclear? What needs clarification?

---

## Valuable  
Why does resolving this matter? What value is lost or blocked?

---

## Estimable  
Provide details that help sizing:

- Logs
- Screenshots
- Error messages
- Clear reproduction steps

---

## Small  
Can this be fixed within a single iteration?

---

## Testable  
Acceptance criteria:

- [ ] Expected behaviour defined  
- [ ] Reproduction steps documented  
- [ ] Verification method agreed
